title: Correction: Why Is Aging Conserved and What Can We Do about it?
fullText: MK wishes to declare the following competing interest, which was omitted from the original article: MK is a founder of the Dog Aging Project, a University of Washington part-funded project that also solicits public donations through the University of Washington Foundation.
